title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:

The woman we rescued survived. Maybe she saw the Grand Duke?

Search for Grand Duke Ravengard.

Speak to her and agree to help then ask her additional questions for additional journal updates:

We learned that the Grand Duke was captured by drow and taken westwards. We agreed to look for the Grand Duke. We should investigate the area.
